name: Shell Girls in Puzzle Skulls
description:
Strip puzzle with skulls and monster girls.

Cross out all the skulls to remove the shells from the monster girls.
The number of lines is limited. The skulls are moving and annoying.

Stylized black and white visual style.
At the end of the puzzle, the picture takes on color.

This game is a small experiment with visual style.

Thank you! And good luck!
